Description:
Detects suspicious use of PCHunter, a tool like Process Hacker to view and manipulate processes, kernel options and other low level stuff

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - PCHunter Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\pchunter64.exe' or process_path like '%\pchunter32.exe') or (original_file_name = 'pchunter.exe' and description = 'epoolsoft windows information view tools') or (hashes like '%sha1=5f1cbc3d99558307bc1250d084fa968521482025%' or hashes like '%md5=987b65cd9b9f4e9a1afd8f8b48cf64a7%' or hashes like '%sha256=2b214bddaab130c274de6204af6dba5aeec7433da99aa950022fa306421a6d32%' or hashes like '%imphash=444d210cea1ff8112f256a4997eed7ff%' or hashes like '%sha1=3fb89787cb97d902780da080545584d97fb1c2eb%' or hashes like '%md5=228dd0c2e6287547e26ffbd973a40f14%' or hashes like '%sha256=55f041bf4e78e9bfa6d4ee68be40e496ce3a1353e1ca4306598589e19802522c%' or hashes like '%imphash=0479f44df47cfa2ef1ccc4416a538663%'))
